TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates an ASP.NET Web Form with a CodeBehind class.

AspNetFile.name: ${Name}.aspx
AspNetFile.FileText: <%@ Page Language="${AspNetLanguage}" Inherits="${Namespace}.${Name}" %> ${Doctype} <html> <head runat="server"> <title>${Name}</title> </head> <body> <form id="form1" runat="server"> </form> </body> </html>
